title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps

title: Online Store (e-commerce)
description: A Django multilingual online store app where users can place orders and sellers can manage them.

title: File Tracking Application
description: A cloud-based internal file tracking platform built for the National Hajj Commission of Nigeria (NAHCON). This system enables secure metadata management and real-time tracking of physical files across departments and units

title: Django AI Coding Site
description: A Django powered web portal that brings AI into your developer workflow. Conceptualized and developed to seamlessly incorporate AI into code editing, this project harnesses OpenAI�s GPT?4 to provide real?time code correction and intelligent suggestions across 30+ programming languages�all inside a polished, responsive interface.

title: Earthquake Map Site
description: Earthquake Map is a lightweight Python application that automatically retrieves the past 7 days of seismic events from the USGS API and generates a standalone, interactive world map. Using Pandas for data processing and Folium for mapping, each earthquake is plotted as a colored, size?scaled circle marker.

title: Weather API
description: A REST API built with Python and Flask to serve historical weather data for various cities.

title: Weather-Forcast-Data-Dashboard
description: This project uses the open weather API to pull places and provides the weather (Temperatue and Sky) for 1-5 days.

title: Tour Scraper
description: A program that checks a music band's website and sends an email when there are new tours.

title: Helper Chatbot
description: A chatbot that knows about a specific topic and answers questions regarding that topic.

title: Webcam Motion Detector
description: A program that monitors the computer webcam and sends an email when a new object enters the view.

title: AI Agent
description: This is an AI Agent using the Retrieval augmented generation model to answer prompts on world population and demography based on the tools provided to it.

title: Restaurant Menu Web App
description: A Django web app to let customers see a restaurant menu and meal availability.
